title: Is MGM’s Plan To Turn The ‘WarGames’ Reboot Into An Interactive Film A Really Bad Idea?
text:
Is MGM’s Plan To Turn The ‘WarGames’ Reboot Into An Interactive Film A Really Bad Idea? 
Published By: Uproxx - Today 
WarGames , the 1983 techno-drama starring Matthew Broderick, can safely be defined as an ’80s classic and, as with many ’80s classic...
